spatial_accuracy.notes: Major plan-to-render layout mismatch. (E2/E5) The top-right zone in the render reads as a kitchen/built-in cabinetry area, but the 2D plan specifies BED 4 + robe there. (E1) The BATH and separate WC shown centrally on the plan are not clearly present as correct rooms with fixtures in the render. (E2/E4) Central corridor geometry is changed (render uses curved/rounded corridor walls and different junctions) vs the plan’s rectilinear hall. (E2/E3) Door locations and swing/orientation do not match the plan (arched openings/offset doors vs specified door positions). (E2/E5) Window placements/counts differ notably (extra/moved windows in bedrooms/living areas vs plan). Room sizes/proportions and balcony relationship appear altered.

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural relationships do not follow the plan. (E1) Missing BATH and WC as distinct correctly detailed rooms. (E5) Hallucinated program elements (kitchen/appliance wall) where a bedroom should be. (E2) Bedroom/robe/linen adjacencies are inconsistent with the plan (robes/linen not located as shown). (E2/E3) Door embeddings/openings are not placed/formed as in plan (arched portals instead of standard door openings; mispositioned entries). Wall thickness looks generally consistent but overall wall layout fidelity is low.

furniture_mapping.notes: Some beds are present, but they do not map cleanly to BED 2/BED 3/BED 4 locations from the plan. (E2) Furniture suggests a living room and kitchen area that are not specified in the plan’s upstairs (Activity room + bedrooms + bath/WC). (E4) Furniture scale appears plausible, but placement is not plan-accurate.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean with coherent lighting and readable spaces. Isometric-style view is acceptable, though not strictly orthographic (perspective present). Geometry is generally clean; however, the curved hall/doors introduce stylistic deviations that reduce plan-faithful clarity.

detected_errors.description: BATH room (with tub/vanity) from the 2D plan is missing or not correctly represented in the 3D render.
Separate WC room from the 2D plan is missing or not correctly represented in the 3D render.
Hallucinated kitchen/cabinetry/appliance zone appears in the 3D render where the 2D plan specifies BED 4.
Bedroom placement does not match the 2D plan (BED 4/BED 3 arrangement and their adjacency to the hall are altered).
Robe/closet and linen locations do not match the 2D plan layout.
Window positions/counts differ from the 2D plan (extra/moved windows across rooms).
Door locations are offset versus the 2D plan; several openings do not align with specified wall segments.
Door orientation/swing logic is inconsistent with the 2D plan (arched/open portals replace standard door leaves and swings).
Corridor and room proportions are distorted relative to the 2D plan (curved hall geometry and resized room extents).
